Description: Anyone who follows regular education. To mainstream education includes all education funded by public and private education to the extent that it leads to a qualification recognized in the Netherlands.
Title: Following formal education

Description: Anyone who follows no education or no formal education. The non-formal education includes all programs and courses with a duration of less than six months. In addition, non-formal education also includes the written or online courses at MBO and HBO level, integration courses and corporate training with a duration of less than one year.
Title: Not attending regular education
